fn.description: To specify the formatted text corresponding to the name of the object the jCard represents.

nickname.description: To specify the text corresponding to the nickname of the object the jCard represents.

photo.description: To specify an image or photograph information that annotates some aspect of the object the jCard represents.

note.description: To specify supplemental information or a comment that is associated with the jCard.

role.description: To specify information concerning the role, occupation, or business category of the object the jCard represents.

gender.description: To specify the gender of the object the jCard represents.

oneOf.description: To specify information related to the time zone of the object the jCard represents.
To specify information related to the time zone of the object the jCard represents.

sound.description: To specify a digital sound content information that annotates some aspect of the jCard.  By default this property is used to specify the proper pronunciation of the name property value of the jCard.

source.description: To identify the source of directory information contained in the content type.

clientpidmap.description: To give a global meaning to a local PID source identifier.

oneOf.description: To specify the date of death of the object the vCard represents.
To specify the date of death of the object the vCard represents.

title.description: To specify the job title, functional position or function of the object the jCard represents.

expertise.description: To specify a field of expertise for the object to which the vCard refers.

caladruri.description: To specify the location to which an event request should be sent for the user.

geo.description: To specify information related to the global positioning of the object the vCard represents.

oneOf.description: To specify a value that represents a globally unique identifier corresponding to the individual or resource associated with the jCard.
To specify a value that represents a globally unique identifier corresponding to the individual or resource associated with the jCard.
To specify the birth date of the object the jCard represents.
To specify the birth date of the object the jCard represents.
To specify a relationship between another entity and the entity represented by this vCard.
To specify a relationship between another entity and the entity represented by this vCard.

impp.description: To specify the URI for instant messaging and presence protocol communications with the object the vCard represents.

interest.description: To specify the interest(s) of the object to which the vCard refers.

member.description: To include a member in the group this vCard represents.

logo.description: To specify a graphic image of a logo associated with the object the jCard represents.

categories.description: To specify application category information about the jCard.

email.description: To specify the electronic mail address for communication with the object the jCard represents.

oneOf.description: To specify a public key or authentication certificate associated with the object that the jCard represents.
To specify a public key or authentication certificate associated with the object that the jCard represents.

rev.description: To specify revision information about the current jCard.

org.description: To specify the organizational name and units associated with the jCard.

caluri.description: To specify the URI for a user's calendar in a jCard object.

prodid.description: To specify the identifier for the product that created the vCard object.

url.description: To specify a uniform resource locator associated with the object that the jCard refers to.

oneOf.description: To specify the place of birth of the object the vCard represents.
To specify the place of birth of the object the vCard represents.

fburl.description: To specify the URI for a user's busy time in a jCard object.

oneOf.description: To specify the place of death of the object the vCard represents.
To specify the place of death of the object the vCard represents.

org-directory.description: To specify a directory of an organization to which the vCard’s entity belongs.

anniversary.description: To specify the date of marriage, or equivalent, of the object the jCard represents.

hobby.description: To specify the hobbies of the object to which the vCard refers.

contact-uri.description: The CONTACT-URI property can be used to include URIs representing an email address or a location for a web form.
